summary.span: 提供傳回 Common Language Runtime 環境的資訊之 方法的集合，。

span.span: Provides a collection of methods that return information about the common language runtime environment.

summary.span: 傳回指定類別上的指定介面。

span.span: Returns the specified interface on the specified class.

returns.span: 要求之介面的 Unmanaged 指標。

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to the requested interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很類似，表示這個執行階段的介面上呼叫方法。This method is similar to calling the method on the interface that represents this runtime. 下表顯示支援的組合`clsid`和`riid`。The following table shows the supported combinations for `clsid` and `riid`. |`clsid`|`riid`| |-------------|------------| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserCLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserExIID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntimeCLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserExIID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorRuntimeHostCLSID_CorRuntimeHost|IID_CorRuntimeHostIID_CorRuntimeHost| |CLSID_CLRRuntimeHostCLSID_CLRRuntimeHost|IID_CLRRuntimeHost (不適用於所提供的 common language runtime [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)])，IID_CLRRuntimeHost3IID_CLRRuntimeHost (not valid for the common language runtime that is provided by the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3| |CLSID_TypeNameFactoryCLSID_TypeNameFactory|IID_TypeNameFactoryIID_TypeNameFactory| |CLSID_CLRStrongNameCLSID_CLRStrongName|IID_CLRStrongNameIID_CLRStrongName| 類似於方法。 is similar to the method.

span.span: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) failure.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 取得正在目前處理序中執行的 Common Language Runtime 的版本號碼。

span.span: A string containing the version number of the common language runtime.
